html: So sad that Barry Dodd has died. We have lost a great champion for our county. Barry was so many things – a self-made entrepreneur, a fund-raiser, a business champion and the Queen’s Lord Lieutenant of North Yorkshire and a friend. He gave of his time to help others.
text:
So sad that Barry Dodd has died.  We have lost a great champion for our county. 
 
Barry was so many things – a self-made entrepreneur, a fund-raiser, a business champion and the Queen’s Lord Lieutenant of North Yorkshire and a friend.  He gave of his time to help others.
